backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing services and appointment bookings with validation, storage, and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI color-update and logo-integration features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and structure of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme tokens for light/dark modes and shared UI variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, fonts, favicon, and OG images for the Baidees Salon site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the UI in ThemeProvider with Toaster.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Booking form component handling input validation, service selection, and backend submission with success state.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Reusable logo component choosing horizontal or square logo variants with size-based classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying logo, quick links, contact info, social icons, and dynamic attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navbar with navigation links, CTAs, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including navbar, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Member: Animated section showcasing membership benefits with icons and a call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/OfferB: Gold banner displaying a limited‑time promotional offer.
frontend/src/components/media/BeforeAfte: Image slider cycling through before‑and‑after transformations with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/media/GalleryGri: Grid layout presenting a set of gallery images with hover zoom effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqAcco: Accordion listing common FAQs with expandable answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Scroll‑revealed section highlighting key salon services with icons and link to full services page.
frontend/src/components/sections/Stylist: Showcases stylist profiles with photos, titles, and bios.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays client testimonials with ratings and quotes in a grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookAppointment.ts: React Query mutation hook that calls an actor method to book an appointment and handles UI feedback and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, identity loading, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to reveal elements when they enter the viewport.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, base styles, and utility classes for animations and color accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app in the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the salon's story and team sections with scroll‑reveal animations and styled content cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactBookingPage.ts: Displays a booking form, contact details, opening hours, and WhatsApp booking with scroll‑reveal effects.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery grid and before/after slider with animated section reveals.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero, intro, service highlights, and before/after sections using scroll animations and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with categorized salon services, scroll-based reveal animation, and UI components like cards and accordions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the salon's design system.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state including design guidelines, required images, implemented features, and architectural notes.
